runs.comm: beaten first ball! That late away movement off a fuller length, Hafeez was forward to drive and that was close to the edge
Steyn loses control of that one, full down the leg side and the batsman couldn't flick it away
slightly slower and he gets well forward and pushes it to the off side
connects and finds the gap, Steyn bowls a half volley outside off and Hafeez got across and caressed it past cover
too straight and on the pads, the fine leg was up and Steyn was punished for that line, turned off the hips behind square, used the pace of the ball
false shot this time, held the length back a bit and Hafeez was on the backfoot to punch it to the off side, not much foot movement
another false shot, this time off the front foot, slower delivery and fuller and moving away, nearly took the edge
short delivery and Nazir was on one leg to whip that away, mistimed wide of short fine leg
nice running, clipped softly towards midwicket and he sets off for a quick single
fullish in length outside off and he comes forward and pushes it softly to the off side
streaky! Nazir shapes to pull but too early on the shot, bottom edge  beats the stumps and the diving keeper for a boundary
nothing streaky about this one, full outside the off stump and Nazir likes the width, slams that square on the off side off the front foot
gives that another blow, this time it's in the air and safely down to Amla at fine leg, too full and wide
appeal for an lbw! Skidded through after pitching and he was trapped on the back foot and that was hitting a bit too high on the pad
imperious! No respect for Steyn as he picks that from middle and off and clubs it over square leg, big gap there
lands it outside off and he punches it down to cover
the slower ball this time beats Nazir's wild slash through the off side, makes a bit of room, eyes on the ball Imran
aims for the yorker but it's a low full toss, he pushes it straight to mid-off

soft dismissal! Nazir gloves it down the leg side and it lobs up and de Villiers takes it diving forward, Steyn bowled it short down the leg side and Nazir couldn't resist the pull, took his glove and de Villiers ran forward and timed his dive well, Nazir's hand came off the handle so he was never in control of that
chipped just over long-off! Tossed up and Hafeez chipped down the track and lofted it, just enough mileage to take it over the rope, Behardian leaped but in vain
spin and bounce! Haffez was foxed there, tried to take control of the bowling by walking down the track, nowhere near the pitch of the ball and it spun away and beat him, de Villiers does the rest
the arm ball hits the pads
skids through and hits the pads and rolls to the leg side
flatter delivery and he clips it to midwicket

Pakistan are wobbling and Peterson has two for the over! Continued bowling round the wicket to the left-hander, Jamshed wanted to deposit that out of the ground and he was completely beaten, gave himself room, easy stumping
on middle and leg and he tucks that to square leg
stays back and he defends it back to the bowler
with the fine leg up you cannot bowl on the pads, easily clipped away by Malik and beats the said fielder
tucks him up for room and he stays back and defends
touch shorter and he stays back and cuts him down to third man
stays beside the line and dabs it to the off side
flighted outside off and he defends it to the off side
flighted again and driven towards mid-off
keeps him quiet again, pushes it to the off side
getting close to a maiden here? Comes forward and drives to the fielder on the off side
quicker delivery and he defends
and a maiden it is! Hits the pads and rolls to slip
comes forward and quietly defends
and they've picked up another! South Africa cannot believe this procession, Kamran Akmal was shaping to cut and the ball skidded through and knocked back his off stump, it was the quicker delivery
tosses it up more and he comes forward and pushes it to the off side
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
keeps him quiet again, stays back and knocks it to the on side
and another maiden would you believe it, he comes forward and gets an outside edge to short third man
gets well forward and drives and finds cover
a run finally, stays back and knocks it wide of cover
tossed up slower and he knocks it towards point
beaten on the drive, nervous times for the batsmen here, slight turn as well
flatter delivery and driven down the ground to long-off
another drive finds cover, the runs are hard to come by
Umar Akmal says enough is enough as he pounces on this short one and clubs it over midwicket, he read the length early and was on the backfoot in a flash
turned to the on side for a single
knocked back to the bowler and Botha nearly flung it back to the keeper
drills a full delivery down to long-on
shot of intent there, Botha fired that full and quick down the leg side, he was on his knee early and swept it to long leg, beat the fielder who dived at the boundary
tossed up slowly outside off and pushed to the off side
short and wide and he slashes it in the air towards third man, Steyn does a brilliant job sprinting to his right and stopping it in front of the rope
fullish outside the off stump and driven neatly down to sweeper cover
the slower ball beats everyone, the off break sneaked past the inside edge and even de Villiers couldn't get properly behind it
turns it with the angle down to fine leg
low full toss and he can only mistime it down to mid-on
bangs it in short and he ducks under that bouncer, might see a few more of those
Duminy comes round the wicket, Akmal stabs it back to the bowler
comes forward and mistimes the drive back to the bowler
fuller delivery and he drills it down to long-off
the quicker one and it doesn't spin, beats the outside edge
cuts firmly but point does well to slide and save a few runs
flatter and shorter and clipped off the pads to midwicket
keeps it nice and tight on the stumps, no room to work with, he pushes it back to the bowler
tough one for the keeper! It was shorter and Malik pulled too early and the ball hit his shoulder, lobbed up and beat the leaping de Villiers, four to third man
fuller delivery and driven down to long-on
chips down the track and hammers it wide of mid-off

and we have yet another soft dismissal! Malik made himself a lot of room to carve that over the off side, he placed it to third man, the ball dipped and landed safely in Steyn's hands, they waited to check for the no-ball but it was a legal delivery
pushed softly towards point and he tells Afridi to wait

forget I even said that! A golden duck for Afridi, he decides to waste no time hanging around, chips down the track first ball and tries to smash that over long-off, the fielder took it well in front of the rope. It was bowled from round the wicket
comes forward and he clips it to midwicket
continues round the wicket, goes for the drive and he's beaten
little short and he cuts it to deep point
quicker delivery and he works it to deep midwicket
flighted delivery and driven down to short cover
quicker and flatter and pushed to the off side
drifts inwards and he plonks forward and defends
releases a bit of pressure here, he comes down the track and makes room, lofts inside out over extra cover, need more of these
flatter delivery and he can only defend it
chips down the track and he goes aerial again, over mid-on and safe of the fielder
clips it to midwicket to keep the strike
good length on the pads and he punches it down to long-on
short and wide and Umar goes for the cut and finds the gap past point, bit of work for third man but he does well to save it

another one bites the dust and Arafat goes! Lovely diving catch by Duminy, extra bounce from Steyn honing in on the body, Arafat tries to fend it off and the ball lobs up and Duminy covers some ground and times his dive well and takes it inches off the turf at short midwicket
beaten first ball, pace and bounce too much for Gul
slower bouncer and Gul didn't see that properly, awkwardly ducked away from that
safely leaves it alone, that's the best he can do, give the strike to Umar Akmal
makes a lot of room and jams out a very full delivery down to deep cover
goes rows back! I bet even he was surprised at how clean that was, length delivery and he swiveled at the crease and clubbed that over deep square leg, quite effortless really
Gul's keeping the interest alive here, another effortless shot, another length ball and he picks that from off and middle and lofts over wide long-on, just over the rope
crashes a fuller delivery straight to mid-off, came off the meat of the bat
Kallis slips that wide of the off stump, those sixes have unsettled him
nicely chipped away and he finds wide long-on, picks a full delivery on the pads and controls the loft
fuller delivery on the pads and he shuffles and exposes his stumps, Kallis appeals for a lbw as the ball rolls to the leg side, leg byes signalled, that was sliding down the leg side
don't go anywhere this is not over yet! Umar Akmal was down the track and the ball is too short, controls the shot well and slices him over backward point
bit too straight and he tucks it to the on side
it's a front foot no ball and a Free Hit! Gul goes for the big hit and ends up skying it to the on side, drops short of the fielder
clubs the Free Hit over square leg and it's only a single as the fielder in the deep picks up
Gul showing he cannot be underestimated as a batsman! Another whack over the on side, picks a length delivery and swings across the line, lands a few rows behind deep midwicket
the equation is narrowing fast! Poor stuff from Morkel, slower delivery outside off and he carves that high over backward point and the ball nearly carries all the way over the rope
another free swing to deep midwicket and they hurry the second
fires that full on the stumps and he drills it down to long-off, beats the bowler
Umar Gul's the man of the moment! Morkel errs by bowling a low full toss on the pads, Gul effortlessly works his wrists and flicks it with ease to deep square leg
close to being a wide there, it was wide outside off and Gul chased that one
another wide one outside off, he chases that and the bat hits the ground, two dot balls
fires that full and wide outside off and he reaches out and squirts it out wide of third man
fullish outside off and he squirts it out to point
ouch! Steyn's in pain here, Akmal bashes it back to the bowler and his heel comes in the way, the ball deflects to long-on, the throw was wide and they take a couple
a touch too short and he makes room and thumps that to sweeper cover
just drops short of third man! Gul goes for the straight hit and ends up getting a top edge that swirls towards third man, Amla runs forward but the ball drops short of him
pulled flat and straight to midwicket and he declines the single
Steyn loses complete control of that one and slips it wide of the off stump, impossible for the batsman to chase that
reaches forward and drives in the air down to sweeper cover

is there another twist here? The South Africans will be relieved to see the back of Gul, it was full outside off and he got underneath the bounce and tried to carve that over sweeper cover, the ball dipped and Peterson comfortably took it in front of the rope
under pressure and Morkel slips in the yorker outside off and Akmal fails to dig it out
that siphons six off the required runs! What a time to bowl a full toss, Akmal's eyes lit up and he smashed that flat and hard over deep midwicket
squeezes out a yorker outside off and he gambles by giving Ajmal the strike

outside edge settles it! Umar Akmal was off the blocks even before Morkel landed it on the pitch, Ajmal decided not to go for any wild slog and settled on edging it past the keeper, there was no slip and the ball raced to third man, smart choice of shot by Ajmal
